changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, base_table.id, entity.name AS entity, auth.name AS grouping_agency, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.version FROM agency_interval_grouping base_table JOIN interval entity ON base_table.entity = entity.id JOIN agency auth ON base_table.grouping_agency = auth.id JOIN agency up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON base_table.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
